content.question: In lines 1-2, the speaker describes “Like” as a “semi-demi goddess” primarily to emphasize the

choices.label: universally held preference people have for being loved over being liked
rapidly decreasing role of religion in most people’s day-to-day lives
surprisingly ancient origins of some seemingly modern social customs
almost religious devotion people have to collecting “likes” on social media

content.answer: almost religious devotion people have to collecting “likes” on social media

skill.text: Skill 6.B: Identify and explain the function of a metaphor.
